SELECT r.record_id,d.doctor_teleno,h.hospital_name,de.department_name from t_medical_record r LEFT JOIN t_doctor d on r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h on r.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN t_department de on de.department_id = r.department_id where TYPE = 1

SELECT r.record_id,d.doctor_teleno,h.hospital_name,de.department_name from t_medical_record r LEFT JOIN t_doctor d on r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h on r.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN t_department de on de.department_id = r.department_id where TYPE in (4,23)

update t_medical_record
patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
patient_teleno = #{patientTeleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_age = #{patientAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patient_sex = #{patientSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
patient_no = #{patientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admission_no = #{admissionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bed_no = #{bedNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_no = #{recordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medical_date = #{medicalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
medical_conclusion = #{medicalConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_pictures = #{medicalPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor_title = #{doctorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor_avatar = #{doctorAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medical_video = #{medicalVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_code = #{medicalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medical_cover = #{medicalCover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
share_id = #{shareId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_enterprise = #{isEnterprise,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_remote = #{isRemote,jdbcType=CHAR},
proc_inst_id = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process_status = #{processStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_base = #{isBase,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_tag = #{reportTag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
final_tag = #{finalTag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_medical_record set patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patient_teleno = #{patientTeleno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_name = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_age = #{patientAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patient_sex = #{patientSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, patient_no = #{patientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admission_no = #{admissionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bed_no = #{bedNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_no = #{recordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medical_date = #{medicalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, medical_conclusion = #{medicalConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_pictures = #{medicalPictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_title = #{doctorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_avatar = #{doctorAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medical_video = #{medicalVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_code = #{medicalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_status = #{reportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medical_cover = #{medicalCover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_id = #{shareId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enterprise = #{isEnterprise,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_remote = #{isRemote,jdbcType=CHAR}, proc_inst_id = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_status = #{processStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_base = #{isBase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_tag = #{reportTag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, final_tag = #{finalTag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select m.record_id, m.patient_id, m.patient_teleno, m.patient_name, m.patient_age, m.patient_sex, m.patient_no, m.admission_no, m.bed_no, m.record_no, m.hospital_id, m.department_id, m.doctor_id, m.medical_date, m.medical_conclusion, m.medical_pictures, m.create_by, m.is_deleted, d.doctor_name, d.doctor_title, d.doctor_avatar, m.type, m.medical_video, m.medical_code, m.report_status, m.medical_cover, m.device_code, m.share_id, m.is_enterprise, m.is_remote, m.proc_inst_id, m.process_status, m.is_base, m.report_tag, m.final_tag, m.client_type, m.remarks, d.doctor_teleno,h.hospital_name,de.department_name FROM t_medical_record m LEFT JOIN t_doctor d on m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h on m.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN t_department de on m.department_id = de.department_id WHERE m.TYPE in
#{medicalTypes}

select m.record_id, m.patient_id, m.patient_teleno, m.patient_name, m.patient_age, m.patient_sex, m.patient_no, m.admission_no, m.bed_no, m.record_no, m.hospital_id, m.department_id, m.doctor_id, m.medical_date, m.medical_conclusion, m.medical_pictures, m.create_by, m.is_deleted, d.doctor_name, d.doctor_title, d.doctor_avatar, m.type, m.medical_video, m.medical_code, m.report_status, m.medical_cover, m.device_code, m.share_id, m.is_enterprise, m.is_remote, m.proc_inst_id, m.process_status, m.is_base, m.report_tag, m.final_tag, m.client_type, m.remarks, d.doctor_teleno,h.hospital_name,de.department_name FROM t_medical_record m LEFT JOIN t_doctor d on m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h on m.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN t_department de on m.department_id = de.department_id WHERE m.TYPE NOT in

SELECT m.record_id record_id, m.share_id share_id, 2 consultation_type, m.doctor_id create_doctor_id, cd.doctor_id consultation_doctor_id, cd.doctor_name consultation_doctor_name, cd.doctor_teleno consultation_doctor_teleno, cd.doctor_avatar consultation_doctor_avatar, h.hospital_id consultation_hospital_id, h.hospital_name consultation_hospital_name, t.START_TIME_ create_time, t.END_TIME_ end_time, (CASE WHEN t.END_TIME_ IS NULL THEN 3 ELSE 5 END) status FROM act_hi_taskinst t, t_medical_record m, t_doctor cd, t_hospital h WHERE t.PROC_INST_ID_= m.proc_inst_id AND t.NAME_= '远程报告' AND t.ASSIGNEE_= cd.doctor_id AND m.type in(4, 23) AND cd.hospital_id = h.hospital_id
